rows.label: qst001001_msg0001
rows.name:
I can't just leave my
post... what should I do...

rows.label: qst001001_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, yeah. A bit of a
problem has come up.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0003
rows.name:
The kids went out to play and
they haven't come back yet.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0004
rows.name:
When they go out to play, they
also gather food and materials
that the village is short on.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0005
rows.name:
We're grateful, but it's
dangerous. I've told them to
stop time and again, but...

rows.label: qst001001_msg0006
rows.name:
I guess they're trying to help
the village in their own way...
like a little mercenary group.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0007
rows.name:
It's not unusual for them to
be late coming back, but...

rows.label: qst001001_msg0008
rows.name: Today they're just way too late.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't like to think about
it, but there's always a
chance something happened.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to go check on them,
but I can't just abandon the
job I was asked to do...

rows.label: qst001001_msg0011
rows.name:
You'll go in my place?
That's a huge help!

rows.label: qst001001_msg0012
rows.name:
The kids said they were going
to the Greatmaw Rapids area.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0013
rows.name:
Please check there first.
I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst001001_msg0101
rows.name:
The kids said they were going
to the Greatmaw Rapids area.

rows.label: qst001001_msg0102
rows.name: I hope nothing's happened to them...
